title: DashMat Dash Board Cover, Crystal Blue
features: Custom made to fit each dashboard
Protects the dash from sun damage, stops cracking and warping
Made of durable, color-fast non-shrinking needle punch carpet
description: Since 1979 DashMat has been the most recognized, best-selling dash protector available. Custom-patterned for a perfect fit, DashMats help protect the dash surface from UV sun and to cover blemishes and imperfections in older dashboards. DashMats keep the interior cooler in the summer and warmer in the winter while reducing hazardous windshield glare. The SuedeMat has the look and feel of rich suede and is available in various colors to match almost any interior.
